duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide deskside support to enterprise users, troubleshoot reported technical issues, and complete necessary steps to resolve problems.
Configure and build PCs, laptops, and software, as well as setup applications and troubleshoot various office equipment.
Track and manage work tickets on ITIL based ticketing systems, diagnose hardware/software issues, and perform repairs on authorized peripheral equipment.
Maintain customer and employee satisfaction, perform asset inventory activities, and create documentation for processes and procedures.
Provide frontline customer support, including hardware and software troubleshooting and diagnosis at the Genius Bar.
